Text: Scanned, clean.  Unique add ons, shouldn't interfere with other installed add ons.  Fake HDR looks great.
And why would anyone buy this when Morrowind Overhaul 2011 is out since a long time ago?
@xidio Don't really know of any other graphic mods, this worked for me, so I figured I'd share it.
Also everyone I only have around 130 kB/s upload... So when you download it, seed for a bit to help others get it. As It'll take forever with just me lol. :)

Attention! x64 users, the Installation file I made, is for 32bit Windows, if you are an x64 user, simply:
Copy the files from "Program Files\ Bethesda Softworks\Morrowind\" to "Program Files (x86)\Bethesda Softworks\Morrowind\".

My bad on the fixed path. lol
What's the tricl to getting this to work?  I installed the game and the mods and then switched the files over to Program Files x86 folder, but the game's not working.
